title: Bug splat before loading screen.
body: Anyone else having bug splat pop up as soon as champion select ends? I've tried to play 2 games and they both ended like this. I have a feeling this may have something to do with the new patch.

replies.body:
Are those bug splats... bugging you (hehe pun intended) 
This [Bug splat and Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) should help you.
Pls, call me CrazFight ... cam was my... dogs name.

What's....happening here.  o_o  It's possible that your game files corrupted and causing your game to crash; though, there might also be other reasons.  The guide CrazFight provided should get this fixed up!  Let us know if you have any questions.  Maybe.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
well my league works now. I just had to update much mac and repair league!
